text: James "Jim" Norton (born 4 January 1938) is an Irish character actor. He is known for his roles in Straw Dogs, Memoirs of an Invisible Man, Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, and in Water for Elephants. Norton was born on 4 January 1938 in Dublin, Ireland. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * List of Performances at FilmReference.com Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:Actors from Dublin Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Jim Norton (actor)
